column6: Deadpool: a terrorist?! That's how Captain America sees it, but Cap doesn't know there are currently two Deadpools in NYC, one who's totally evil and one...well, one who's not quite as bad.
column8: | artist:Guru-eFX | artist:Nick Bradshaw | artist:Salvador Espin | artist:Frank Martin | letterer:Joe Sabino | writer:Daniel Way
